searchParam.name: appointment-type
searchParam.documentation: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The overall status of the appointment

searchParam.name: clinical-status
searchParam.documentation: The clinical status of the condition

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who/what is the subject of the document

searchParam.name: period
searchParam.documentation: Time of service that is being documented

searchParam.name: setting
searchParam.documentation: Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: A date within the period the Encounter lasted

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient ro group present at the encounter

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Business Identifier(s) relevant for this EpisodeOfCare

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient who is the focus of this episode of care

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a subject to list flags for

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the Healthcare service name

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient for the vaccination record

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postal code specified in an address

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations of this medication code

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations with this external identifier

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return administrations of this medication resource

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list administrations  for

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: MedicationAdministration event status (for example one of active/paused/completed/nullified)

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return dispenses of this medicine code

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Return dispenses with this external identifier

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return dispenses of this medicine resource

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list dispenses  for

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Return dispenses with a specified dispense status

searchParam.name: authoredon
searchParam.documentation: Return prescriptions written on this date

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return prescriptions of this medication reference

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Returns prescriptions for a specific patient

searchParam.name: effective
searchParam.documentation: Date when patient was taking (or not taking) the medication

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Returns statements for a specific patient.

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Return statements that match the given status

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The classification of the type of observation

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about (if patient)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Any identifier for the organization (not the accreditation issuer's identifier)

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the organization's name or alias

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postalCode specified in an address

searchParam.name: email
searchParam.documentation: A value in an email contact

searchParam.name: family
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the family name of the patient

searchParam.name: given
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the given name of the patient

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

searchParam.name: phone
searchParam.documentation: A value in a phone contact

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postalCode specified in an address

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the organization the practitioner represents / acts on behalf of

searchParam.name: practitioner
searchParam.documentation: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organation

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: A code that corresponds to one of its items in the questionnaire

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The unique identifier for the questionnaire response

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient that is the subject of the questionnaire response

searchParam.name: questionnaire
searchParam.documentation: The questionnaire the answers are provided for

searchParam.name: actor
searchParam.documentation: The individual(HealthcareService, Practitioner, Location, ...) to find a Schedule for

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: The type of appointments that can be booked into associated slot(s)

searchParam.name: schedule
searchParam.documentation: The Schedule Resource that we are seeking a slot within

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The free/busy status of the appointment
